name: Brobot
body:
[![Join the chat at https://gitter.im/stvhwrd/brobot](https://badges.gitter.im/Join%20Chat.svg)](https://gitter.im/stvhwrd/brobot?utm_source=badge&utm_medium=badge&utm_campaign=pr-badge&utm_content=badge)
This repository is home to the autonomous robot prototype project developed for ENGR 120 at UVic. Brobot is a prototype for an autonomous nuclear disaster cleanup robot. The predetermined milestones of development guided the evolution of the robot (physically) and its brain (code). ![Brobot!](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/stvhwrd/brobot/master/Brobot.png) ### What we used to create and develop ### * [VEX Programming Control Starter Kit](http://www.vexrobotics.com/vex/products/robot-starter-kits) * [ROBOTC for VEX Robotics](http://www.robotc.net/download/vexrobotics/) * Windows 8.1 (64 bit) via Parallels 10 * Set ROBOTC application preferences as per [ENGR120 pdf](http://bit.ly/1F03s1l) ### Milestones ### * **Milestone 1** - Concept sketches (Individual) due 4 PM on Monday Feb 16, worth 10% * **Milestone 2** - Mechanical systems test (Group) due Thursday Feb 26 In lab, worth 25% * **Milestone 3** - Electrical systems test (Group) due Thursday March 12 In lab, worth 25% * **Milestone 4** - Software systems test and Integrated operation (Group) due March 26 in lab, worth 40% ### Results ### Brobot killed it! Our team received an A+ after passing all tests and inspections.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
